sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The castel of helthe gathered, and made by Syr Thomas Elyot knight, out of the chief authors of phisyke ; whereby euery man may knowe the state of his owne body, the preseruation of helthe, and how to instruct well his phisition in sicknes, that he be not deceyued. Elyot, Thomas, Sir, 1490?-1546.
[16], 90 [i.e. 180] p.
In ædibus Thomæ Bertheleti typis impress., Londini : M. D. XXXIX [1539]
Imprint from colophon. "Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum"--Colophon. Signatures: A-X⁴ Y⁶. Title within ornamental border. Pages numbered on recto only. Imperfect: signature B₃ lacking. Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======
The castel of helthe gathered, and made by Syr Thomas Elyot knight, out of the chief authors of phisyke ; whereby euery man may knowe the state of his owne body, the preseruation of helthe, and how to instruct well his phisition in sicknes, that he be not deceyued. Elyot, Thomas, Sir, 1490?-1546.
[16], 90 [i.e. 180] p.
In ædibus Thomæ Bertheleti typis impress., Londini : M. D. XXXIX [1539]
Imprint from colophon. "Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum"--Colophon. Signatures: A-X⁴ Y⁶. Title within ornamental border. Pages numbered on recto only. Imperfect: signature B₃ lacking. Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
impress.
